org.spongepowered.api.item.enchantment

Class EnchantmentTypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.item.enchantment.EnchantmentTypes

  • public final class EnchantmentTypes
extends Object
    An enumeration of known EnchantmentTypes.

    In vanilla the minimum level of these is 1, while the max levels vary.

    • Field Detail

      • AQUA_AFFINITY

        public static final EnchantmentType AQUA_AFFINITY
        Increases regular underwater mining speed.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 1.

      • BANE_OF_ARTHROPODS

        public static final EnchantmentType BANE_OF_ARTHROPODS
        Increases damages and causes slowness for a variable amount of time depending on the level to "arthropod" mobs. In vanilla this includes spiders, cave spiders, silverfish, and endermites.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 5.

      • BINDING_CURSE

        public static final EnchantmentType BINDING_CURSE
        Prevents removal of the cursed items that reside in the armor slots.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 1.

      • BLAST_PROTECTION

        public static final EnchantmentType BLAST_PROTECTION
        Reduces explosion damage.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 4.

      • DEPTH_STRIDER

        public static final EnchantmentType DEPTH_STRIDER
        Increases underwater movement speed.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 3.

      • EFFICIENCY

        public static final EnchantmentType EFFICIENCY
        Increases mining speed.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 5.

      • FEATHER_FALLING

        public static final EnchantmentType FEATHER_FALLING
        Reduces fall damage.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 4.

      • FIRE_ASPECT

        public static final EnchantmentType FIRE_ASPECT
        Sets the target on fire.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 2.

      • FIRE_PROTECTION

        public static final EnchantmentType FIRE_PROTECTION
        Reduces fire damage.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 4.

      • FLAME

        public static final EnchantmentType FLAME
        Sets your shot arrows on fire.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 1.

      • FORTUNE

        public static final EnchantmentType FORTUNE
        Increases block drops.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 3.

      • FROST_WALKER

        public static final EnchantmentType FROST_WALKER
        Creates frosted ice blocks when walking over water.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 2.

      • INFINITY

        public static final EnchantmentType INFINITY
        Causing shooting arrows to not consume regular arrows.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 1.

      • KNOCKBACK

        public static final EnchantmentType KNOCKBACK
        Increases attack knockback.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 2.

      • LOOTING

        public static final EnchantmentType LOOTING
        Causes mobs drop more loot.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 3.

      • LUCK_OF_THE_SEA

        public static final EnchantmentType LUCK_OF_THE_SEA
        Increases luck while fishing.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 3.

      • LURE

        public static final EnchantmentType LURE
        Increases rate of fish biting your hook while fishing.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 3.

      • MENDING

        public static final EnchantmentType MENDING
        Repair item durability with experience.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 1.

      • POWER

        public static final EnchantmentType POWER
        Increases shot arrow damage.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 5.

      • PROJECTILE_PROTECTION

        public static final EnchantmentType PROJECTILE_PROTECTION
        Reduces projectile damage you take, for example from arrows, ghasts, blaze fire charges, and similar in vanilla.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 4.

      • PROTECTION

        public static final EnchantmentType PROTECTION
        Reduces all damage, outside of a few sources that bypass armor, such as the void, the kill command, and hunger damage in vanilla.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 4.

      • PUNCH

        public static final EnchantmentType PUNCH
        Increases knockback by shot arrows.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 2.

      • RESPIRATION

        public static final EnchantmentType RESPIRATION
        Extends underwater breathing time.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 3.

      • SHARPNESS

        public static final EnchantmentType SHARPNESS
        Increases melee damage.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 5.

      • SILK_TOUCH

        public static final EnchantmentType SILK_TOUCH
        Allows collection of blocks that are normally unobtainable, such as diamond ore, cocoa, mycelium, and similar in vanilla.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 1.

      • SMITE

        public static final EnchantmentType SMITE
        Increases damage to "undead" mobs. In vanilla this includes skeletons, skeletons, zombies, withers, wither skeletons, zombie pigmen, skeleton horses and zombie horses.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 5.

      • SWEEPING

        public static final EnchantmentType SWEEPING
        Increases the damage of the sweeping attack.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 3.

      • THORNS

        public static final EnchantmentType THORNS
        Attackers are damaged when they deal damage to the wearer.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 3.

      • UNBREAKING

        public static final EnchantmentType UNBREAKING
        Increases effective durability.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 3.

      • VANISHING_CURSE

        public static final EnchantmentType VANISHING_CURSE
        Causes the item to disappear on death.

        In vanilla the maximum level is 1.
